_comment1: 'MVSF' contains Server Config Information for MVSF

MVSF._comment1: If your server is using SSL, rename '_SSL' to 'SSL'

SQL._comment0: Keys under Install, will only be used when installing your DB
SQL._comment1: db_name - Name of the Database you wish to create
SQL._comment3: login_name - Specifies the name of the login to grant execute rights.
SQL._comment2: nLoginType = 0 -> Use existing Login, 1 -> Create Windows Login, 2 -> Create SQL Login
SQL._comment4: password - Used for nLoginType of SQL Login. (i.e. nLoginType = 2)
